name: alex

stmt.origin: bitri(wal(s0, w0), wn(wex(s0, wn(w0))), wal(s0, wn(wn(w0))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wn(wex(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, wn(wn(w0))))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(wn(w0))), wn(wex(s0, wn(w0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wn(wex(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, wn(wn(w0))))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(wn(w0))), wn(wex(s0, wn(w0))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s0, wn(wn(w0))))
-| wb(w0, wn(wn(w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wn(wex(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(wn(w0))), wn(wex(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(w0, wn(wn(w0)))

|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wn(wex(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wal(s0, wn(wn(w0))), wn(wex(s0, wn(w0))))

comment: Universal quantifier in terms of existential quantifier and negation. Dual of ~ df-ex . See also the dual pair ~ alnex / ~ exnal . Theorem 19.6 of [Margaris] p. 89. (Contributed by NM, 12-Mar-1993.)
